NEW FEATURES!: A complete redesign/rewrite of the database.
You can now set any number of channels as voting channels. No limitations!
You can add any number of level up roles. No limitations here, too!
NEW COMMANDS!: Added `blacklist` command to blacklist users globally from using Bastion.
Added `ignoreInviteFilter` command. You can now set channels and/or roles to be ignored by the invite filter.
Added `ignoreLinkFilter` command. You can now set channels and/or roles to be ignored by the link filter.
Added `ignoreWordFilter` command. You can now set channels and/or roles to be ignored by the word filter.
Added `ignoreMentionFilter` command. You can now set channels and/or roles to be ignored by the mention filter.
RENAMED COMMANDS: Renamed the `ignoreChannel` and `ignoreRole` commands to `ignoreChannels` and `ignoreRoles`, respectively.
NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORE: Removed the `userBlacklist` command, because same thing can be done with the new `blacklist` command.
Removed the `buyGift`, `gift`, `giftShop` and `myGifts` commands. Why do you need a gift shop when you can have a custom shop!
